cause.description:
In order for a more peaceful dimension, there is only one option. Ben Government must hold supreme power. He will ensure your women fertile, your children healthy, and your men brave.
I promise as your ruler of the universe, to give you immortality and infinite bliss. All you must do, is bow to me, and do as I say. Could it be any easier?
You have nothing to lose. The battle for my supremacy begins on facebook. Join me in my struggle for a better world/galaxy/universe.
1. Ben Government must answer to no mortal man of any creed.
2. BenGovernment must drink the blood of his enemies from their own skulls.
3. Ben Government must have a chariot pulled by albino tigresses.
4. Ben Government must wear a crown of solid Polonium.
5. Ben Government must be bathed in the sulfuric seas of venus bianually.
6. All followers of Ben Government will live.
7. All nonbelievers of Ben Government will be made into marshmallow peeps.
8. Anyone with a popped collar will be executed by firing squad in front of their children.
9. The children of collar poppers will be forced to read Marmaduke comics for 300 years.
10. Ben Government will have a Beluga whale Gucci handbag, in which he will store the souls of his fallen enemies.
cause.mission: ensure Ben Governments dominion over the galaxy.
cause.name: Ben Government For Supreme Chancellor of the Universe
